object.name: upgradeGift
object.description: Upgrades a given regular gift to a unique gift. Requires the can_transfer_and_upgrade_gifts business bot right. Additionally requires the can_transfer_stars business bot right if the upgrade is paid. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Upgrades a given regular gift to a unique gift. Requires the can_transfer_and_upgrade_gifts business bot right. Additionally requires the can_transfer_stars business bot right if the upgrade is paid. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Upgrades a given regular gift to a unique gift. Requires the *can_transfer_and_upgrade_gifts* business bot right. Additionally requires the *can_transfer_stars* business bot right if the upgrade is paid. Returns :code:`True` on success.
